from_dpor_website.note: DPOR License Lookup website requires specific navigation to Real Estate board section. Current license information (0226025311) already documented in files.

historical_data.note: Historical principal broker records from 2014-2025 require FOIA request to DPOR

supervision_certifications.note: Quarterly supervision certifications require FOIA request
supervision_certifications.requirement: Quarterly face-to-face supervision certification for licensees >50 miles from principal broker

principal_broker_gap_analysis.json.note: Contains gap period analysis, FOIA request template, Wayback Machine search plan

kettler_operations_gap_period.json.note: Contains Virginia properties list, unit counts, data sources

50_mile_rule_violations.json.note: Contains distance analysis (1,300 miles), supervision certification requirements

unlicensed_activities_documentation.json.note: Contains documented unlicensed activities by Edward Hyland and others

texas_regulatory_violations_analysis.jso.note: Comprehensive analysis of Texas-related regulatory violations including foreign qualification issues, 50-mile rule violations, shell company structure, and Lariat Realty Advisors connections

personnel_license_verification.json.note: Contains license verification for all personnel across multiple states

regulatory_compliance_gap_period.json.note: Contains regulatory compliance analysis during gap period

skidmore_all_firms_matrix.json.note: Contains matrix of all 38 firms with Skidmore as principal broker

skidmore_firm_supervision_capacity.json.note: Contains analysis of supervision capacity across 38 firms

additional_regulatory_violations.json.note: Contains additional regulatory violations beyond principal broker gap

financial_scale_analysis.json.note: Contains financial scale analysis (22,000+ units, 97 properties)
